answer: <p>Python's idiom for doing this is <code>newList = oldList[:]</code></p>

<p>The deepcopy option is the only method that works for me:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> copy <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> deepcopy

a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ]   ]
b = deepcopy(a)
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'Deep:'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ]   ]
b = a*<span class="hljs-number">1</span>
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'*1:'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ] ]
b = a[:]
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'Vector copy:'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ]  ]
b = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(a)
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'List copy:'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ]  ]
b = a.copy()
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'.copy():'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
a = [   [ <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>) ]  ]
b = a
b[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]=[<span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'Shallow:'</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(a)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(b)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'-----------------------------'</span>)
</code></pre>

<p>leads to output of:</p>

<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python">Deep:
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
*<span class="hljs-number">1</span>:
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
Vector copy:
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
<span class="hljs-type">List</span> copy:
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
.copy():
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
Shallow:
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
[[[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">3</span>], [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>]]]
-----------------------------
</code></pre>

<p>The method to use depends on the contents of the list being copied. If the list contains nested <code>dicts</code> than deepcopy is the only method that works, otherwise most of the methods listed in the answers (slice, loop [for], copy, extend, combine, or unpack) will work and execute in similar time (except for loop and deepcopy, which preformed the worst).</p>
<h3>Script</h3>
<pre class="lang-py s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-python"><span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> random <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> randint
<span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> time <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> time
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> copy

item_count = <span class="hljs-number">100000</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">copy_type</span>(<span class="hljs-params">l1: <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>, l2: <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span></span>):
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> l1 == l2:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">'shallow'</span>
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-string">'deep'</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">run_time</span>(<span class="hljs-params">start, end</span>):
  run = end - start
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(run * <span class="hljs-number">1000000</span>)

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_combine</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = [] + l1
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'combine'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_extend</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = []
  l2.extend(l1)
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'extend'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_unpack</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = [*l1]
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'unpack'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_deepcopy</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = copy.deepcopy(l1)
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'deepcopy'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_copy</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>.copy(l1)
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'copy'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_slice</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = l1[:]
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'slice'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_loop</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = []
  <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(l1)):
    l2.append(l1[i])
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'loop'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">list_list</span>(<span class="hljs-params">data</span>):
  l1 = [data <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> i <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(item_count)]
  start = time()
  l2 = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(l1)
  end = time()
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">dict</span>:
    l2[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>][<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>].append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">elif</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">type</span>(data) == <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>:
    l2.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {<span class="hljs-string">'method'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'list()'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'copy_type'</span>: copy_type(l1, l2), 
          <span class="hljs-string">'time_µs'</span>: run_time(start, end)}

<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> __name__ == <span class="hljs-string">'__main__'</span>:
  list_type = [{<span class="hljs-string">'list[dict]'</span>: {<span class="hljs-string">'test'</span>: [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]}}, 
          {<span class="hljs-string">'list[list]'</span>: [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>]}]
  store = []
  <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> data <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> list_type:
    key = <span class="hljs-built_in">list</span>(data.keys())[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]
    store.append({key: [list_unpack(data[key]), list_extend(data[key]), 
                list_combine(data[key]), list_deepcopy(data[key]), 
                list_copy(data[key]), list_slice(data[key]),           
                list_loop(data[key])]})
  <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(store)
</code></pre>
<h3>Results</h3>
<pre class="lang-json s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"list[dict]"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"unpack"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">56149</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"extend"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52991</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"combine"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">53726</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deepcopy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">2702616</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"copy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52204</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"slice"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52223</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"loop"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"shallow"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">836928</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"list[list]"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"unpack"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52313</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"extend"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52550</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"combine"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">53203</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deepcopy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">2608560</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"copy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">53210</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"slice"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">52937</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"method"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"loop"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"copy_type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"deep"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"time_µs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">834774</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span>
</code></pre>
data.title: How do I clone a list so that it doesn't change unexpectedly after assignment?
data.content: <p>While using <code>new_list = my_list</code>, any modifications to <code>new_list</code> changes <code>my_list</code> every time. Why is this, and how can I clone or copy the list to prevent it?</p>
